name: Squid Salad With Lemon-And-Parsley Oil
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 pounds squid, cleaned, tentacles separated, bodies cut across into rings, 1/8 inch thick
4 ribs celery, trimmed and thinly sliced
1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a medium pot of water to the boil. Add the squid and blanch for 1 minute. Drain and set aside to cool. Place the squid in a bowl and toss with the scallions, celery, lemon-and-parsley oil, salt and pepper. Taste and adjust seasoning if desired. Can be served cold or at room temperature.
